PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-03592018-03-26,  PCH,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectNational Capital Commission ** land exchange **
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION to conclude the acquisition of land from the City of Ottawa in the Greenbelt, Mer Bleue sector, in Ottawa, Ontario, in exchange for the disposal of lands to the City for the construction of a roundabout at the intersection of Anderson Road and Renaud Road in the Greenbelt, in Ottawa, Ontario.
AttachmentsAttachment
